Params: {1: "The test is getting harder as I delve deeper into it. Even though I had other students working with me, I couldn't avoid failing for the first time.", 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '2', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "But it's not a big problem. We can just start over. If everyone's losing points together, the overall rankings won't be affected.", 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '2', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 7: '2'}
{1: 'The instructor told us that all the simulations are based on real-life events. Is that some sort of hint?', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '2', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Looks like I'll have to look into it in the archive center.", 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '2', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 7: '2'}
{1: 'I ran the simulation according to the battle records, but it still turned out to be a total loss.', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '2', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'The instructor told us nonchalantly today that dogmatism is the worst thing to follow in a war.', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '2', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'He sure understands our pain point, but if he truly believes that, why did he punish me for not caring about the operation plan before?', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '2', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 7: '2', 8: '1'}
{1: 'After eight failed attempts, we finally did it, but we were kind of lucky too.', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '2', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Luck... We can wait to get lucky by starting over the simulation again and again.', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '2', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "But those people who stand on the battlefield only have one chance... I guess that's what the instructor truly wants us to understand.", 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '2', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bieble', 3: "I haven't seen Freeman around recently. What's he been up to?", 4: '1'}
